SEARCH
Package parsers

Class MetaDataParser

java.lang.Object
parsers.MetaDataParser
public class MetaDataParser extends Object
This class parses out all the metadata from an MEI string. It uses a static final hashmap of the tags we are searching for.

  • Field Summary

  • Field Details

    • META_TAGS

      private static final Map<String,TagSpec> META_TAGS
      Maps MEI metadata tags to their corresponding Elasticsearch field keys. These tags represent various metadata elements that may appear once or multiple times in MEI documents.

  • Constructor Details

    • MetaDataParser

      public MetaDataParser()

  • Method Details

    • getDataFromElement

      public HashMap<String,String> getDataFromElement(Element meiHead)
      Parses metadata content from the given MEI element by extracting text within configured metadata tags. The returned map associates Elasticsearch field keys with the concatenated, lowercased text contents found inside those tags. Some fields are combined post-parsing to produce consolidated entries like titles and keywords.
      Parameters:
      meiHead - the MEI XML chunk containing metadata tags and values
      Returns:
      a HashMap mapping metadata field keys to their extracted string values, or null if no data found

    • getTextContentForTag

      private List<String> getTextContentForTag(TagSpec spec, Element root)
      Extracts the trimmed text content of all Element nodes under the given root that match a tag specification defined by TagSpec. This includes an optional attribute name and value filter, where only elements with matching attribute values are considered.

      For each matching element, its text content is retrieved via Node.getTextContent(), trimmed, and included in the result list if non-empty.

      Parameters:
      spec - the TagSpec defining the tag name and optional attribute filter
      root - the root Element under which to search for matching elements
      Returns:
      a list of non-empty, trimmed text contents of matching elements

    • combineTitleFields

      private void combineTitleFields(HashMap<String,String> metadata)
      Combines individual title-related metadata fields into a single titles entry.
      Parameters:
      metadata - the metadata map to update

    • compileKeywordsField

      private void compileKeywordsField(HashMap<String,String> metadata)
      Concatenates all non-empty metadata field values into a unified keywords entry.
      Parameters:
      metadata - the metadata map to update

    • appendIfNotEmpty

      private void appendIfNotEmpty(StringBuilder sb, String value)
      Helper method to append a non-empty string to a StringBuilder, with a trailing space.
      Parameters:
      sb - the StringBuilder to append to
      value - the string to append if non-empty
